title: Case-Based Simulation Education Exploring Gender Differences in Entrepreneurial Learning Experiences

context.prior_knowledge: Basic concepts of entrepreneurship and foundational theories in social sciences
context.additional_context: A course where learners experience gender-specific entrepreneur case studies in VR environments. Applies learning frameworks through post-simulation discussion and reflective learning

learning_goals: Learners can explain differences in learning experiences between male and female entrepreneurs through case studies
Learners can apply single-loop and double-loop learning processes to real-world cases
Learners can analyze the impact of gender-based entrepreneurial learning strategies on different stages of business growth
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
